text: Robert Foster (February 22, 1891 - August 25, 1960) was an American swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre freestyle at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:1960 deaths Category:American male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of the United States Category:Swimmers at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Robert Foster (swimmer)
